listitem.simpara: Fixed: wasted bandwidth when bullet-debugging is disabled.
Optimized general bandwidth usage to be similar to pre-2.1.0 days.
Fixed: friendly-fire poison syringes have no effect.
Fixed: poison syringes have no effect when share-adrenaline is disabled.

Changed &linux:name; signal management. SIGHUP now behaves identical to SIGTERM in that it will cause safe server shutdown. This is done to promote maximum compatibility with screen-style server management scripts. SIGUSR1 is now caught and queued to cause same behavior as !readconfig command.
Changed serverctl script command readconfig to reload.
